title: Walk Away
description: A novel for anyone who has ventured down the wrong path and thought it too late to turn back.Jenna Mace, with a torn family and an indistinct future before her, can’t remember the last time she felt truly happy. It all changes when she meets Luke Rye –the Golden Boy she always dreamed of– who came to fill her dull days with brightness... But also bring her own demons to light. Luke will show her a world she’s never known before, one of love and adventure. What seems like freedom, though, can be short-lived and come at a great cost.Love, like addiction, removes all choices.
author: Liz Thebart
